_header: We prayen believe God will and pity
_description: The Virtues serve us — two couplets

BLHar7322.Transcription: vs preyen bileue god wille & pitevs kepen god hope Mekenes & kastvus sit by pouert wisdom & god leuygvus seruen clannesse rych & feyr beryg
BLHar7322.Note: Set out to right of Latin text of similar content, beginning, “Innitant igitur fides pietas & beneuolencia.”
BLHar7322.Editions:
Furnivall,  Frederick James,

             Political, Religious and Love Poems, from Lambeth MS. 306 and other
